title: Blog — Numeral
description: Explore our in-depth articles and resources on all aspects of sales tax, crafted by industry experts to provide you with the insights and guidance you need.
seoDescription: Explore our in-depth articles and resources on all aspects of sales tax, crafted by industry experts to provide you with the insights and guidance you need.

data.html:
Resources

Explore our in-depth articles and resources on all aspects of sales tax, crafted by industry experts to provide you with the insights and guidance you need. From fundamental principles to complex scenarios, our content covers every angle, helping you navigate the nuances of sales tax confidently.

Last updated:

January 1, 2025

data.html:
Featured

Numeral acquires Ruby Card team

We are excited to welcome Ruby Card to our team. This marks our first acquisition, and with it, we now have seven YC founders working at Numeral.

Spend fewer than five minutes a month on sales tax compliance with our white-glove service.

Learn about SaaS sales tax in Nevada, including taxability rules, rates, and compliance tips to ensure your business stays tax-compliant.

<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
    flex-direction: column;
    grid-row-gap: 0.75rem;
    height: max-content;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field, .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
    width: 100%;
    height: 2.75rem;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
    max-width: 100%;
  }
  
  .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
    height: 2.75rem;
    width: 100%;
  }

}


</style>

<script>
  hbspt.forms.create({
    portalId: "39949294",
    formId: "7c6aefad-be41-466e-9cdb-38a4d3786439",
		onFormReady: function () {
      // Remove asterisk from placeholder:
      $('input[name="email"]').attr("placeholder", "Enter your work email");

			// April 1st changes:
			const pageSlug = document.querySelector('html').getAttribute('data-wf-item-slug');
      if(pageSlug == 'global') {
      	document.cookie = "enteringPage=global; path=/";
      }
    }
  });
</script>
